name: Kick the Gang
description:
Destroy, fire, shoot and don't even think about stopping! You have a giant arsenal to Kick the Gang!
Are you bored with so much stress?
I think Kick the Gang! is a good choice, there is no time limit, infinite firepower and bullets where you can completely release the pressure.
Have you encountered many problems in your life and are you struggling to find the right place for anger?
Collect free coins, more weapons, and tools to choose from!!
